title: New psychometric evidence for the thesis advisor abuse scale (EMAT) in Peruvian university students based on classic and modern procedures
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Oscar Mamani-Benito, Maria Elena Rojas-Zegarra, Renzo Felipe Carranza Esteban, Tomás Caycho-Rodríguez, Lindsey W. Vilca, Susana K. Lingán-Huamán
